reviewText:
wow, i'd love to go to one of these parties that are on the video!!!
The Bed scene is super hot and i'd recommend this video to anybody who loves to see excellent looking women

Playboy's Girls of Hedonism: Runaway Bay, Jamaica is a provocative travelogue video on this island getaway. While it predictably eschews Jamaica's history in favor of its scenery, even the admiration for its paradisiacal splendor is too easily forsaken. For example, three female "naturalists" (I think that's the appropriate term) set off to explore a botanical haven apparently known as the "Ruby Fruit Jungle," but the focus on flora and fauna shifts abruptly when they discover a bed in the wilderness and decide to explore each other instead. Perhaps the video succeeds best in its anthropological study of a tourist tribe located at the Hedonism resort - particularly with attention to tribal dress, social interaction and even mating rituals. For such enlightening ethnographical education, I'd give this one a big thumbs up.
